questions.text: Choose the word that has the same rhyme scheme. battle
In this question, select the option that best explains the information conveyed in the sentence. If he were here, it could be more fun.

options.label: A
options.text: He did not show up and so the occasion lacked much fun

options.label: B
options.text: He was expected but did not show up to liven up the occasion

options.label: C
options.text: There was no fun because he was not present

options.label: D
options.text: He was being expected to supply more fun

questions.text: Choose the appropriate stress pattern from the options.The stressed words are in capital letter(s) Fluency
Choose the word that is opposite in meaning to the capitalized word(s) Victor played the role of a HAUGTHY prince.
Choose the option that is nearest in meaning to the capitalized word I was SKEPTICAL about the story she told me.
Pick out the option with a different rhyme
Choose the word that does not have the same vowel sound as the others.
